meanings.definition: A person who is foolish or incompetent.
meanings.sent1: The bozos at the circus kept tripping over their own feet.
meanings.sent2: The group of bozos couldn't figure out how to fix the broken car.
meanings.sent3: The bozos tried to juggle but ended up dropping all the balls.
meanings.sent4: The team of bozos managed to turn a simple task into a complete disaster.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bozos stumbling around in oversized shoes was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of bozos walking down the street, each wearing a red nose.
meanings.sent2: The circus was full of colorful bozos entertaining the audience.
meanings.sent3: The bozos all piled into a tiny car, trying to see how many could fit inside.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with laughter as the bozos performed their silly antics.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the bozos dancing around in oversized pants brought smiles to everyone's faces.
